Articles.Content:
Saw this on Steam today.  Hmmm.... Very intersting.

 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1120220/Soviet_Space_Engineers/
People's Method Of Rocketry Propulsion For A Paradise In The Stars agrees with this game

It looks interesting, I guess... but it seriously looks like one long cutscene with timed events.  I mean, what do you actually do?  I don't seen anything more involved than "This is broken, click on it to fix."  Am I missing something?
